name: Solar System (itch) (nonabeans)
description:
Hey! Hi!

If you want to see a highly inaccurate but cute lil solar system model, check this out!

I added the following elements:

  1. Realistic textures and specular shaders (high smoothness but low shine for ideal "planets in space" look)
  2. A separate sun halo object, for more realistic glow effect
  3. Varied pitch for planet hum based on size (so they harmonize with each other when they pass by!)
  4. An absurdly simple "UI" (it only includes the background for the mini-map and the mini-map itself; it also scales to the screen)

Credits:

  • Created by Sonya Shoup
  • Textures by Solar System Scope
